# startDate

**Instance Property**

The start time for the pedometer data.

## Declaration

```swift
var startDate: Date { get }
```

## Discussion

The `startDate` and [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMPedometerData/endDate] represent the period of time over which the pedometer data was gathered.

## Getting the Dates

- **endDate**: The end time for the pedometer data.
